seo/description: Listen to the official soundtracks of Zenless Zone Zero, add your favorite musics to your playlist, on desktop or mobile app.
navbar/search/placeholder: What do you want to listen to?
modals/create-playlist/description: This playlist is private and only you can access it.
modals/add-to-playlist/description: You want to add {t} to a playlist?
modals/add-to-playlist/no-playlists-desc: You must create a playlist to add tracks
central-bar/characters-playlists-descrip: You can find all official songs for each characters.
central-bar/most-played-songs-of-the-mon: Most played songs of the month
These are the top 10 of most played songs of the month.
modal-request-login/title: You need to be logged in to do this action
modal-request-login/description: You can login with your Google account. We do not store your informations, only your email to be able to authentify you.
modal-change-profile-picture/description: You can change your profile picture to your favorite character.
modal-change-playlist-picture/descriptio: You can change your playlist picture to your favorite character.
modal-change-playlist-name/description: You can change your playlist name. It cannot be empty.
download-app-ios-modal/title: How to install the app on iOS
download-app-ios-modal/description: Follow these steps to install the app on your iOS device. It's only 3 clicks.
modals/news/description: Astra Nomical Moments musics and Ellen battle theme are now available! You can now listen to these new songs in the game. Enjoy the new battle themes and character songs.
navbar-other-tools/leveling-calculator/d: Calculate the resources needed to level up your characters to your desired level.
navbar-other-tools/comic-generator/descr: Create comics featuring your favorite Zenless Zone Zero characters.
navbar-other-tools/chat-generator/descri: Generate a chat with your favorite Zenless Zone Zero characters.
